sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- <BaseLabel :name="label"> -->
    <textarea
      class="textarea"
      @input="$emit('input', $event.target.value)"
      v-bind="$attrs"
    />
  <!-- </BaseLabel> -->
</template>

<script>
import BaseLabel from './BaseLabel.vue';
export default {
  name: "BaseTextarea",
  inheritAttrs: false,
  props: {
    label: String,
  },
  components: {
    BaseLabel
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
.textarea {
  resize: none;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  //
}
</style>
